bioconda.name: learnmsa
bioconda.summary: learnMSA: Learning and Aligning large Protein Families

biotools.summary: Multiple sequence alignment formulated as a statistical machine learning problem, where an optimal profile hidden Markov model for a potentially very large family of protein sequences is searched and an alignment is decoded.

bioschemas.name: learnMSA
bioschemas.summary: Multiple sequence alignment formulated as a statistical machine learning problem, where an optimal profile hidden Markov model for a potentially very large family of protein sequences is searched and an alignment is decoded.
